function.name: get_component_data
function.description: DKDB: Get detailed data for one or more component keys

component_keys.description:
List of component keys. If component keys are associated with motors, ESCs, pumps or nozzles then keys must be indexed and cannot have placeholders. Examples:
* Correct: ['motor_centrifugal_2','board_esc_6']
* Incorrect: ['motor_centrifugal_{NOZZLE}','board_esc_{MOTOR}']

function.name: mark_as_resolved
function.description: Mark the current case as resolved and close it
